name: Pi-In'Ere
overview: Pi-in'ere is a multi stage arcade game loosely based on the coin-op games Dig-Dug and Mr Do. The player takes control of Burt, and must avoid the enemies and collect a number of items to complete each stage. Some levels have edit buttons which Burt can drop on the enemies to score extra points and send them back to their starting positions. The game has 63 unique levels including bonus stages every ten levels.
